snippet: The U.S. military has a problem with embedded sexual predators.
abstract: Op-Ed article by filmmaker Kirby Dick argues that rising reports of rapes and other violent attacks in the US military involves a problem with embedded, serial sexual predators; holds that military justice system is ill-equipped to deal with problem due to deep institutional bias; expresses support for legislation introduced by Sen Kirsten E Gillibrand and colleagues that would empower military prosecutors and judges to decide whether to investigate and prosecute felony crimes.
lead_paragraph: The U.S. military has a problem with embedded sexual predators.

headline.main: Don’t Trust the Pentagon to End Rape
headline.print_headline: Don’t Trust the Pentagon to End Rape

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
